item.description:
UPDATE.. NEW LOCATION>>>>PLEASE RSVP by 4:30 pm so we may know how much spag and stuff to get.........

Al -
Hi Rob...


Per my VM, as most (Bob, Jill, me, Deb (late), Kathy G. (late)
and Janice (maybe)) will be coming from the north... would you
like to move the "simple spaghetti dinner" to Bob/Rob's place?

Sure..i can do that....


I talked it over w/ Bob and he'd be fine/prefer that. If so,
feel free to update your posting, requesting people MapQuest
directions to:

123 Saint Augustine Street
West Hartford, CT 06110

done....


Please request they RSVP "YES" by 4:30 on your site, so I'll
know how much spahgetti, sauce, salad and Italian bread to pick
up. If you've already picked some of these items up, feel
free to bring them, but let me know.

...I bring the big spag pot.....also i bring the sause in the jar (3-4 jars of variety) and the parmesean chez..not enough time to make a real pot of good sause stuff.


We have all been overdoing the partying and many are going
kayaing in the morning, so it'll be a low-key, early evening.
We can have a fire pit in our back yard. I think Laura Z will
likely come to, from Middletown. Probably don't want to have
too many, however. If it suddenly get's a lot of people, we
can take up a collection, or ask people to post what they'd
like t bring.
its a late posting , i dont think many would go..

Na there are so many other things going on on friday..not many want to spend time with us geezers, they want to go to the loud bars...and dance wishing for romance...

This is NOT intended to "steal your thunder" in any way, and
we'd all be fine coming to your place. Either way.

oh im so bent out of shape.( just like the spagetty will look like in the pot)..i dont know what to do...booo hoo..

done the update is in the works...


Let me know via phone if possible.

- Rob

Rob Pudney
C: 860-690-9595



Since I was going to cook spagetty for dinner anyway, a extra pound or two isnt that much to add..
I know there are activities in Hartford at the Park and other locations..but sometimes too many people, well im just not into it.or going to bars..
Besides im going to groton to help with the kayak rescue practice the next morning...
So a "simple evening ?" i don't know what that is anymore..
might be good..besides if thunderstorms..i would like to avoide getting wet anyway..

I put 6:00... MEET Us at ROB's and BOB's
so if a few of you are interested, im going to make spagetty,
then if its still nice out..the fire pits comes alive..yeh 2 of em...
Maybe no wine though..(it will be hide as a backup..just in case..) had way too much tasty make me feel good wine lately....
Grape juice, yeh..im getting some of that on the way home from the FOOD store...not liquer store.....red and white...maybe a good change till next week...


Ok getting to Rob's and Bob's



easiest way is...
rte 84
from the east exit 44 ..at end of exit..left on kane st...
next left onto..oakwood ave...cross over highway..pass by wilfred..the next right is st augustine...
123 is on the left..
from west exit 44..at end of exit..left on caya to light..take right onto prospect..then the next right again..on to westphal..follow that down to st augustine..keep going strait..



Bring something else if you want...bred or other stuff you eat with spagetty..

Ok thats it..I have to go now....

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Small Simple Spagetty Dinner NOW at Bob's in West Hartford
